website_summaries.verdict: We love this dog house's stress-free assembly, good looks, and durability. A close second to the Petmate.
pros: A top choice for its durable and attractive wood construction and superior protection in all weather conditions
cons: It's difficult to clean the interior

customer_reviews.title: Good for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have a 85 lb shepherd and he fits with room to spare. Easy assembly. Smells great and looks like a quality product. Power drill helps a lot with the installing the feet. My fur baby likes it.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Rain ruined the dog house
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this right before all the rainy weather here in California. It was so easy to put together and my golden just loves it...The only problem is it is def not weather rain proof. Today we had a break in the rain and the insulation insert I bought is soaked and the sides of the dog house are bowing out. So disappointing...the dog house is essentially ruined from the rain and my dog is without a dog house...
customer_reviews.author: Megan Feder

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pile of waste. It fell appart after less than 3 months. Literally fell apart. The floor came apart, then the interior bracing separated from the frame and fell down. The rear wall boards are now coming down. Don't buy this junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: TahoeOtter

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad looking a few flaws but worked perfect for what ...
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad looking a few flaws but worked perfect for what I was look to do with it. For an extra $30 insulated the hole thing for wintertime I'll leave another review later for how the insulating worked out still need to get a heater for it.
customer_reviews.author: weasel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 60lb dog
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the pictures. Sturdy and easy to put together (maybe 20 min). My dog actually laid in it while we attached the roof. Also bought the navy precision insert in large (which fits perfectly) so the floor is extra insulated. I have a Husky-Malamute (60 lbs) and she can stand, lay and turn around comfortably. Haven't put it outside yet, but the roof is sturdy enough to handle snow/rain.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog house for what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dog house for what i was looking for. Shipping was excellent arrived a day early. Easy to build. Hes about 60-70lbs and he has plenty of room to moved around and get comfortable inside. Perfect for my Husky He loved it. As soon as i was done building it he jumped right in.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Baca

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: The brand name says everything about their product - Precision. Would highly recommend this dog house. Assembly was dummy-proof. Each piece was stamped FRONT, BACK, LEFT, or RIGHT and the instructions showed exactly where to put each bolt or screw. Very professional product. Only had one tiny finish nail that was not seating correctly for the room piece but once you put the roof piece on with the supplied screws that nail issue resolved. Product made of nice smelling, bug resistant, lightweight cedar. We also bought the insulation kit which popped in and installed in 3 minutes. The cabin took 15 minutes to piece together!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Barker

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY, CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, a cardboard box would be a better dog house. Very cheap wood and poorly painted. This is the 2nd one sent and its also damaged this one by a forklift. I think a 70# dog will fall right through the floor, its that cheap of wood. 3 parts of the house was either split or broken. Was looking forward to this house for my dog. :( Never again buy from this company brand. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy i bought this!!
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed for the stay kitties I take care in my condo development. I was told I would be waisting my money bc the cat's won't use it but I'm so glad to say that they are 😁... I purchased a heating pad that turns on once the cat lays on it so I don't have to worry about it being all the time.
customer_reviews.author: deebrown

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a feral cat shelter for the cold weather. I put in some foamboard on the floor and on the side walls for extra insulation. The cats love it.....they went right in. You do not need to permanently attach the roof with screws if you don't want to. The roof will sit in place without shifting around as it sort of locks into position once you set it on top of the walls. I left it unattached because I want to be able to lift it off so I can remove and reinsert the bedding easily without having to crawl through the doorway opening.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Wa

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Cabin delivered broken had to be rigged to be work, due to no return shipping label ever being provided. Leaks water and won't keep dog dry, dog would rather sleep outside than inside due to water leaking. Horrible customer service experience first time ever! Won't even consider buying this product again in fear of arriving broken.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, be prepared to seal the wood yourself
customer_reviews.text: The design looks great. The assembly was very easy, hardware included. I wish the floor was made of thicker boards; they were the same 1/2" think slats used for the walls. There appears to be able support for the floor, but I'd feel better if they were a full 1" think. Finally, the dark trim pieces provide some protection to those pieces of wood, but the rest of the wood in the walls and floor are bare wood. The marketing materials state they're sealed with a weather resistant coating, but I was skeptical of this claim. Fortunately, I had some leftover stain & sealer from a recent fence gate project, so I applied this extra layer of protection.
customer_reviews.author: SalmonGuy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our pet pig to have as a shelter. It hasn't been water-proofed, so we had to add a sealant. The floor boards were already coming up when we assembled it. Doesn't seem like it will handle any sort of use for very long. The wood is more like kindling than solid wood boards. But it's cheap and will work while the pig is small.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Alder

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely over priced. Cheap wood, difficult to assemble, and horrible wood floors that I had to cut to make them fit. It's fine for my feral cat. However, I would NEVER suggest this product for someone and their dog. I'm going to add stainer to it to prevent wood rot cause I'm doubting this is even weather proof Soooo cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: MedicalDreamer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty soft wood, and although the roof looks like its pretty waterproof, I went ahead and waterproofed the wood with polyurethane just to get some extra life out of an easily foreseeable problem. Its looks great, and has plenty of room. I'm also guessing that I could probably level the thing with a few strong kicks at where the walls come together, but I don't think my German shepherd could hurt it with his rough housing. I actually installed both the medium and large versions under my porch, so my main issues with the product probably wont be a problem for me. Unbeatable value for how I'm using them.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Good shelter for outdoor cats
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I kind of wish the accessories (door flap, custom insulation kit) were available, but we made do with a $12 piece of insulation from Lowe’s, which was definitely a cheaper option. This is to provide shelter to our two outdoor cats this winter. We decreased the size of the opening with insulation panels to provide security and protection from the elements. Might paint it black so it blends a little better. But it works!
customer_reviews.author: kdsale

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but still a good value.
customer_reviews.text: A well thought out design. Super easy to assemble and easy to clean. The roof just lifts off on mine, the XL size, has a suspended slatted floor that lifts right out in 3 sections that are light easy to maneuver. Comes with plastic feet to keep the wood from contacting the ground and the floor is effectively about 3.5" off the ground, so pooling water is not an issue. The XL's dimensions are 45" x 38 " x 40", huge, but still ships quickly via FedEx.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it was easy to put together seem kinda fragile to me but well see how it when my husky comes home will update soon Update* 4/22/19 Still up and in good condition 👍 Update* 5/22/19 Still in good condition and still standing 👍 Update* 11/29/19 Still standing 👍
customer_reviews.author: Steffysanchez

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this over a year ago it and it went through a heavy snowfall (winter). It has great construction and easy to assemble. I made some modifications in the assembly, adding wood glue to all the pieces and parts that fuse together. I mounted the house on concrete blocks to keep it out of the mud and to make sure that constant use doesn't compromise the ground. It is a very well-made doghouse. It was worth the price. The floor can pop out for easy cleaning, in case leaf litter gets inside, or you want to hose it off. It's a great shelter with a sloped roof.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rootes Author

customer_reviews.title: Was happy at first
customer_reviews.text: I have had this over a year. It was OK at first. If you have a chewer this isn't for you. I already wasn't thrilled about the lack of sturdiness or the fact that it wasn't weatherproof, but my Australian shepherd has easily destroyed the flimsy boards. It isn't the whole thing thankfully, we may be able to salvage it. We'll see. I wouldn't purchase this type again unless the dog was not a chewer, it would also need to be under some sort of porch or something. If it is directly out in the elements it isn't weatherproof at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good looking dog house
customer_reviews.text: The roof is solid and durable. The walls are light weight 1/4" thick wood slats. The floor is about 3" from the the bottom of legs, so you can put a piece of carpet, etc, for vapor barrier. If you want to cut out the wind shear, then add rigid insulation on the interior of the walls and floor. I inserted a padded dog bed inside it and my 60lb dog likes to lay in there. The door is plenty large enough for larger dogs (i.e. german shepherd etc) The exterior paint and roof finish are nice looking and match our log home. Only complaint - it's a bit expensive at $100. However, I would recommend this dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Gulaman

customer_reviews.title: Looks or quality?
customer_reviews.text: Bought the large size dog house. The package came in good shape. Found no problems with the individual pieces it came in after unboxing. Now the wood itself is thinner than I expected. The most heavy duty part is the rooftop. The bottom has a little space in between the wood slats, I guess it air flow idk. Over all I’m satisfied with it but the quality of the bottom where your pet will lay could be better. Will be doing some mods to reinforce it tho. Not a bad buy tho it’s nice looking and with a little tweaking it will actually be weather durable in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Resendiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I think what i have gotten for the cost was so worthed. The assembly was super easy for me as i can build this without even looking at the manual as it kinda explain it self with the bolts and nuts access hole on the wood. I place a whole large dog bed inside it and my dog loves it. If you stay in a cold area then you might want to add some insulation using a staple gun as seen on some of the pictures others have posted. It is real wood, it's sturdy, and was made very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 65lb American Bully comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried ordering this online since the reviews were 50/50 on how it would arrive from shipping. It arrived in great condition. Phew.. It Didn't take long to put together. Once I put a soft mat in it my 65+lb American Bully was happy. He likes it even better with a soft plush blanket inside. The roof is very soild however, the structure of the sides and floor is a little thinner then I imagined. Because my dog like to hop right in we may need to reinforce the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Solid roof and wood. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was debating on getting this because of the reviews with people saying the wood was cracked and stuff when they received it. But nope! They must've upgraded because everything is solid (You have normal scratches here and there, tiny ones but nothing crazy) the wood on the floor part is also solid, not cut to perfection so it wiggles a tiny but nothing crazy again. I am happy with this product and especially the price for how solid it is. Highly doubt you'll find anything better for the same price unless you build yourself. Highly recommend buying it ! I got the Medium one and its bigger than what I thought. Check out my pictures to see.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy... At all...
customer_reviews.text: This doghouse only lasted about a month. It's pretty darn light, and got blown away by the wind fairly easy (thankfully, my dog wasn't in there). The back wall and floor got busted up pretty good, and I'm unable to reassemble it. Anyone thinking of buying this would be better off getting the material they need for a doghouse and building one. On the plus side - I guess it looks kind nice... but not so much when it's been smashed up, though :/
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Just not a destructive large dog, other wise yes.
customer_reviews.text: We love, we bought 2. For our Med sized dogs. Much room for a large dog, we have one, but ours is too powerful an she would destroy this build of a home, she needs thicker hard wood. I would suggest for a calm large dog though. We put insulation boards inside all 4 walls and floor, a flat carpet, then straw. Glue insulation w/gorrilia glue if using some. And we put ours on pallets for off ground more, ya know rain/snow. Well worth money, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Tams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality materials
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble. Took me a bit longer, because I wanted to put insulation on the inside. But everything fits together nicely, and the bolts and screws are good quality as well. All the holes lined up perfectly, and everything was well marked. I do wish they had offered an insulated version. While a nice little house, there is no way this would be warm enough in the cold winter months! Which is why I lined mine with cut to fit foam.
customer_reviews.author: doodlebug

customer_reviews.title: too expensive for the product.
customer_reviews.text: I would feel good about paying half of what I paid for this. It's about as sturdy as a doghouse made of playing cards and toothpicks. The dog has already chewed it to shreds and it is very think and flimsy wood especially the floor! It looks great, but is cheap crap and way to expensive. Get the igloo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used all winter and still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.text: We have a red heeler and it works great for him. When we put it together we just added some sealer to the edges of the roof and in the creases of the shingles. He has used it all winter and it still looks brand new. And I love that it has a slated bottom for the circulation of air for summer. Our dog does not jump on the roof so I am not sure the longevity of it if your dog likes to jump up on things. We love it and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Carlson

customer_reviews.title: My dog is happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my dog who spends a great deal of time outside. We have only had it for about a month and it still looks brand new but it will obviously start to west as time goes by, I will be sure to update. But as for now it works well and have not had any issues with it. I will say the roof part came damaged In transit which was expected but amazon was understanding and sent out a replacement which I received about a week later. But all in all very happy with the purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Munoz

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: If i could give zero stars i would. This thing is cheap not made for quality, description said it could fit a full grown (medium size) dog. This things fits a cat. Tried returning, it paid for it to be returned to have them send it back saying it camt be return when the label said it could, to have it end up back on the front porch saying "cant be return". Waste on money and time buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: dillion slate

customer_reviews.title: Garbage dog house. Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the worst purchase I have ever made on amazon. I decided to go with this dog house because the overall rating was higher and decided to ignore the bad reviews. I was wrong. This thing is.trash. brittle. Arrived damaged. Do they not have quality control checks on these things? The.company should be held accountable for ripping people off with such a poor quality product. Do not purchase. Try anything else!
customer_reviews.author: William R. Poe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited to receive it only to open it and find a side of the roof broken off and the other side of the roof cracked. The package is too heavy to return and too much of a hassle. The assembly would have been easy had the roof been properly assembled and screws not missing or falling out as soon as i set the roof on top of the walls. Never will buy this companies products again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my goat's being they don't like the rain. Yeah I spoil my kid's! It was very easy to put together and is very sturdy, goat's like to climp and jump and they have done just that on top of this house. I bought the large one and 2 Momma goat's and 3 babies go in it so it would be great for a large dog. My only disappointment is it doesn't come with a door flap, sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Suanne B.

customer_reviews.title: good value dog house for a rottie
customer_reviews.text: we have an older rottie and i got this for her. it was pretty easy to assemble. the pieces were not as thick/well made as i thought they should be but our dog has now been using it for over a year and it looks like it did the day we assembled it and has not broken so i am impressed. plus it is not plastic
customer_reviews.author: JACOB DALE

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: The material the dog house is made of is skimpy. There are a couple thin sheets of styrofoam that literally fall apart when you open the box. If you do buy this dog house from Amazon make sure you have some wood glue and wood clamps on hand for the repairs, because regardless of having Amazon prime, repacking the box is impossible. Today this 60 year old woman rebuilt this "log cabin". Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: SisS

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: So i bought the large house n was bigger than I thought which was great. We have an American bulldog, a chihuahua and a tiny terrier mix. They all fit inside the house. The entrance is a bit big so not sure how it will be when it rains. It smells great, very easy to assemble. The only thing i thought that would of made this dog house perfect was if it was sturdier on the bottom, the wood seem to bend when any weight was on it. Finger crossed that it last a while..
customer_reviews.author: Orchid

customer_reviews.title: No weather proof, terrible construction, broken
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash. The side paneling isn’t even set properly. There’s 1/8 inch gap between each one. There’s absolutely not weather proof coating on this. Not even a stain. Wood is bare and very brittle. To finish it off, it’s broken. Anywhere you look you can find something wrong with it. Trust me when I say that the construction of this is terrible. Idk what other people who did reviews got but it sure wasn’t this. DO NOT GET THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Rambo the dog luvs it
customer_reviews.text: At first the pup wudnt go in there so I propped the top up so it wasn't so dark in there and then I dragged it to where he was sleeping near the door, now hes in there all the time, got a heating pad for him. The roof had a small puncture so I knocked off a star but that was from shipping. It went together fast, looks great and Rambo the German Shepard pup luvs it.
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: About the quality you'd expect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Basically exactly what I was expecting for $100. Just needed something quick for my dog to stay warm in for the rest of the winter and didn't have the time to build something myself. Can't imagine this thing will hold up for more than a season. Absolutely no way it's weather resistant. Wood is very porous and will absorb water in a hurry. Several pieces came chipped/cracked as did several of the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I would expect this product would be worth the money but it is not!! I have to put rocks/stepping Stones on the front to legs because if not my baby boy would be soaked. 😔😔 The bottom of the house is worthless. Why in the world would you put a 3 piece bottom on a dog house? It falls out all the time!! I had to put wood screws in it to stop that! Which didn't come with screws to do so!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: This house is very cheap feels like its going to break because the wood is so thin. The roof is water proof but the rest of the mouse might go thru due to the wood being so thin. When i was building it seemed like it was going to snap in half. I had to pad the floor and walls with carpet to keep the cold out. The floor has gaps that let the cold in thru the bottom. The house is ok but i had to put more work into it to make it weather proof. Also used silicon to cover gaps on the sides of the house and the roof. The house is decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Dog says two paws way up
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is attractive and has a nice design to keep the dog out of the weather. He likes it. We put it together in about 20 minutes. It is not the most durable of dog houses that I have ever built, but it gets the job done and months later it still looks beautiful. We have a lab Heeler mix, same size as a lab, and this house is the perfect size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: Nice to look at. My 65lb dog fits with extra room. The top isn't very sturdy, it bows when she gets on it I'll have to reinforce it. Extremely easy to assemble. Definitely recommend the liner/insulation for cold climates. It doesn't seal tight and allows air to enter from sides and floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, works for cats
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the alley cats in our neighborhood as we live in the northeast and have cold wet winters. We wanted something with no scent from our house (we have two male cats inside). We loved that each piece had their parts written out, like front left, front right. Made it very easy to know where everything belonged. The 4 star for easy to assemble is due to the feet, there are no hole marks on them and we were not using a powerdrill so the screwdriver took a while to go through. Everything else was easy. It seems very sturdy, and i haven’t had long enough to test durability-so far so good. The cats do use it!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hankey

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: First, I got delivered 5 days later than expected. Second, the packaging thoroughly damaged. After opening it up, the packaging styrofoam looked like a bunch of mice went to town on it. For the actual product: cheaply made, missing screws, the "feet" are NOT adjustable, one was broken and a piece of the wood itself was broken off. The boards used for the floor do not lineup. The roof seems sturdy. As for weather resistant - absolutely not. I suggest doing this yourself with silicon as you are putting it together. I would have returned this item, but unfortunately, the box it was shipped in was non-servicable.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: shoddy product
customer_reviews.text: you're better off building one yourself, the material that this product provides is terrible quality. The wood thickness is about 1/4 in. I feel like i'm overpaying for a product that at most likely is going to last a couple months. You can definitely build a dog house for much less and significantly better quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog house!
customer_reviews.text: Positive: Easy to assemble with the directions included in the package. Snug fitting parts have no gaps. Pay attention to the flooring as there are two orientations that they can go into the bottom. Flooring is off of the ground, which allows for better overall temperature. Roof has 3 tab Shingles, so works great, even in the weather. I'd recommend getting the Pet Log Cabin Style Dog House Insulation Kit as well to improve the insulation of the unit. Negative - Wish the roof was detachable for easy cleaning of the interior, it's nailed into place, but I've worked around it by using screws when I assembled it instead.
customer_reviews.author: portalflight

customer_reviews.title: 75Lbs Husky fit in the Large!
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad, but not to great either! Nice look in the yard. However it's been since about Christmas and I can see in a year, this is no match for my 75lbs husky. He's kinda chewed the door frame! I was going to get the insert for winter but after reading reviews and how my pup is.... yeah no... summer is coming and.... we'll see!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love it, super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! We bought this for our puppy to have for some shade when it’s hot during the summer & somewhere to hide out. Good for the price & good size! I bought a dog bed to put inside as well so that it’s more comfortable if she goes to lay down in it. We had no problem with ours or putting it up. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog house at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased this because I had purchased another from another vendor previously and the quality and size was not as advertised and it was poor quality. However, this one was great. It went together in about 20 minutes and very easily. It had multiple and clear copies of the instructions and was very simple but the holes lined up and everything fit well. Nice dog house at a good price and I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John M Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice house, will need some work
customer_reviews.text: Great product, looks nice and sturdy. Only problem with this is shipping... there is no chance to receive an unbroken product. There is no padding and only paper separating each side. Mine arrived with a broken roof but I was able to glue it mostly back together, though there was asphalt exploded everywhere. Just be aware
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made, more good for decoration than housing pets
customer_reviews.text: This product is much thinner and WAY less sturdy than the pics lead you to believe. Very poorly made floor falls out and falls apart , any kind of wet weather finds its way into it, and it’s just a cheaply made decorative house, not something you can actually rely on to keep your pet warm and dry. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: pesty327

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged twice but beautiful dog house
customer_reviews.text: My issue with my order was that it arrived broken the first time I ordered it. When I received my replacement, that too was broken. It was less damaged than the first one but knowing it was damaged really pinched my nerve. I gave up after the second time and decided to keep it as is because the dog house was very heavy for me to go back to USPS and return it again. I received partial credit after I complained about the damage. I managed to improvise and cover up it. It really is a beautiful house though and my dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It was so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this Petmate Precision Outback Log Cabin dog house. I really like to in place black shingles already in place. The main issue I have is the thinness of the wood and so easily splits. There were a few spots that were cracked on the frame work that had to be repaired. I had to reinforce the floor in each of the two Cabin dog houses to make sure my big dogs of 70 and 80 pounds did not break through the thin wood. Karen Coleman Free - verified purchaser March 2020
customer_reviews.author: Karen C. Free

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dog House!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Super easy instructions and super easy to put together. Took me only a few mins to put it all together. Already testing out in the snow today and looks like it’s holding very well. My dog will have to fight my kids apparently to be in it. Tools I used were a fat and thin Philips head as well as some pliers. That’s all you need. Bummed the roof doesn’t lift open but it’s fine. Glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: John-Paul

customer_reviews.title: Get a great product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic, the dogs have torn it to pieces! One Corky and a dachshund rat terrier, so if they could if they would have! The inside I didn’t buy with installation but the dogs and just happy with it with a few blankets inside, but we also live in California. Other than that no issues with the roof, no leaking!
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put together, fairly lightweight material. I've been using it as a goat house, and with a tarp wraparound, it has held out against some pretty nasty little thunderstorms we've had. The sides are only about 1/2 inch thick, so it needs some type of exterior support to help maintain against the elements (near a house, garage, wall, etc.) It is very tall and both the mini-goats fit in very comfortably (unless one goat head-butts the other goat out), with a nice layer of hay.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well, I put the dog house together and it looks amazing until I was ready to attach the roof. To my disappointment it was broken and damaged. Ugh!!!! There’s nothing worse than paying good money for damaged items. I noticed that a lot of buyers are reporting the same issues. My advice to seller, better packaging or have your people be more careful while packaging. The box was not damage but item was. To buyer, it’s hit or miss good luck!! Update: a week after the bottom kept falling through, my poor Maltese ended up just laying outside of the doghouse. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material and small
customer_reviews.text: This dog house was easy to put together but there is no way it will hold up out in the elements. Very light weight material (except for the roof). The floor is worthless for a heavy pet. This dog house is very small. Do not waste your money on this if you plan on using it for a large pet or using it outside.
customer_reviews.author: JDB

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: 100% crap. I bought 2, and 1 is in pieces already. We cannot fix it. The dogs have only been using it for 4 days. (I expect the 2nd one will be in pieces here in a couple of days, it has already started to fall apart) DO NOT but this. Not worth the money at all. I am very upset about this. I gave it 1 star because there was not an option of zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad-made of cedar, so expect that smell. There were a few chips in the wood but nothing that would affect functionality. Assembly was easy other than there not being pre drilled holes in the feet. Am a bit doubtful that the floor is sturdy and will hold up, but can always reinforce later. Looks good, not an eye sore like those plastic igloo looking things.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but overall it was good
customer_reviews.text: Packaged arrived damaged with a huge whole in the side of the box. Two pieces of the dog house were pretty damaged as a result (as pictures). However, we decided not to send it back as we were in a pinch because the temperature was dropping and our dogs needed a warm place to stay while we were at work. We patched the broken pieces and the dog house assembled pretty easily. Overall, it’s a great dog house for the money. I don’t think you could build one like it for any less.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaKatelynTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Good house for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice house, easy to put together. Light weight so easy to move. A little banged up in places but overall good. * apparently my dog fits in the small dog category because the house is huge for him(dog + 7yo kid fit inside!), but that’s my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Money

customer_reviews.title: very cheap craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived a week later than the expected ship date. When the box arrived at our house, the box was very damaged. Upon opening the box I realized how flimsy the product was. There were sever cracks, dents, chips. Some areas were not stained. The roof was broken. I am not impressed with this product at all, but I need something for my dogs so this will have to do for now. Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Tony R

customer_reviews.title: You could easily add some additional bracing to sturdy it up though
customer_reviews.text: The materials are cheap. We had a few small broken pieces but the main issue was the roof had been broken during shipment. We ended up covering the top with a sheet and leaving it in our living room. It is too fragile to assemble then attempt to move more than a few feet. You could easily add some additional bracing to sturdy it up though. Our dogs seem to enjoy it. For the price, if it lasts a year I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to follow instructions and has a very sturdy base. It’s like a tiny home for my large dog. This was a good height off the ground because my dog has hip issues, German Shepherd, but put it together in like 40min.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Damaged right out of the box and the bad thing is we didn’t take it out of the box until recently because we were moving so now we are passed the date and can’t return it. Assembly was easy but with the damaged panels I’m worried it won’t really hold up well. Hopefully it will last a long time. Just disappointed in the product quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylan Williams

customer_reviews.title: It is Okay, overpriced though
customer_reviews.text: Made with cheap wood. The dimension tolarence is surprisingly good, so no issue on assembly. The surface finish was no where close to what the picture shows. I bought a can of water proof paint for wood and spray every panels before putting them together. The bottom three pieces are removable. The roof panel is heavy. I did not put the four screws for the roof panel in so I can remove the top to clean if necessary. May try to install hinges later. It looks to be good for outdoor but overpriced for the materials it uses. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: zhd535

customer_reviews.title: don't waste money on this
customer_reviews.text: PLease, don't waste money on this. I purchased 2 of them. Very cheap quality, made. The bottom is the worst. They started to fall apart about a month later, all screws falling out, the bottom broke into pieces. They are big for big dogs, should have been stronger, better woods. PLease make them better or don't even sell them .
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My Huskie loved it.. a little smaller than I thought it would be for a medium size and I thought the quality would be better but I can't complain yet. I will revise my review once it starts raining to see how it holds up here with California weather. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Ezy

customer_reviews.title: easy installation, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We received our new dog house a few days early, Yeah! It took two people about 20min to put it together. One screwdriver is all. I will say Im worried about the floor. It is a bit light / unstable. We have a lab 65lbs and Boston about 15lbs. Both fit in nicely. We did order the plastic covering, should come with it. The roof is probably the strongest part of the house. I would not have ordered if we lived in a cold snowy location.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A plastic dollhouse would have been more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A soft delicate bunny could crush this thing. It arrived with several pieces already broken, and once we put it together, my 75 pound dog caused the bottoms to collapse the second he stepped inside. But the worst part is the instructions. This thing came with TWO sets of instructions, and each one is ENTIRELY DIFFERENT. Is this a joke? Each set of instructions has a maximum of 5 steps. FIVE STEPS and this is the best you can do??? Two different instruction packets that are each blatantly, entirely different and completely contradictory? Luckily the setup is pretty self-explanatory, but the stupidity behind the whole thing was enough to make me think the company is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The design is great, but not the quality
customer_reviews.text: The design is great, but not the quality. The black wood frame on our dog house was split. The wood absorbed rain water the the wall swelled. The roof also absorbed water. I had to caulk the the roof and coat the entire dog house with Thompson's Water Seal. It was very easy to put together. My 11 year old sons got it done within 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy, thin wood, and screws come out.
customer_reviews.text: Had the large doghouse delivered 1/20/20, assembled it 2/10/20, and 3/4/20 I see a section of wood coming apart from the screws meant to hold it in. My dog is 13 pounds under the manufacturing limit, and where the screws came undone is in a place where the dog couldn’t have put much weight on it for it to break/come apart the way it has. I called Petmate, and was told I’d need to buy a replacement dog house, not a part, but the entire thing again. CSR I spoke to didn’t seem to care much of the issue. Will not be buying anything from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big, and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and built it. I haven't been able to put it out because our yard hasn't been finished yet. But it was easy to build amd looks nice and sturdy. My toddler son plays with it from time to time. I do recommend a dog mat because the bottom slats might come undone
customer_reviews.author: Pzam

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This dog house has worked out perfectly for our two dogs. We keep it near the house and it is covered by another roof. Snow and rain gtets on the dogs and they get in the house but there is no wear and tear. This dog house is much higher quality than I expected. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Y Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Nice but thin walls.
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to put together my daughter and I did it in less than 30 mins. My beagle seems to really like this house too. I just wish the boards were a little thicker for more insulating purposes. I dont think my dog will be comfortable in it in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Build your own dog house....
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large dog house for my 6 month old husky. 3 major things with this dog house. 1) Thin wood.. $122.. This dog house is made out of wood for crates. I expected something more thick. This dog house should be $80 2) The corners of the roof are not fitted perfectly. See pictures..... 3) It states up to 95lbs dog.... my husky is under 95lbs and the wood was bending. The company needs to add wood under the floor for more support or thicker wood. Note to self..... next time build your own dog house.
customer_reviews.author: damian mercado

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with a cracked piece of wood also. My husband caulked the roof to prevent it from warping.
customer_reviews.author: SnowWhite49333

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this !! We have a black lab and he sleeps in it all the time !! Perfect size ! Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cracked when screwing in roof!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fragile, It works. But, Barely. I'm afraid when I move it. I cracked the sides when screwing in the roof ( There were no pre-drilled holes for the roof nor the feet!) The floor barely fits. The middle is bowed out so far the floor nearly falls threw it. Literally millimeters from falling. Smelled terrible. I would not get for a dog. My 16 pound cat makes the floors creek. (I bought the Medium. Which was wrongly advertised in dimensions. It's not longer then the large. )
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to assemble but that’s it. It is worthless as a dog house and you’d be better off spending the money on something of better quality. Floor has fallen out. Walls coming apart. Just terrible. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great house!...but
customer_reviews.text: Ours got a little dinged from the shipping, but still works. Was able to insulate during the winter time. Makes me feel a bit at ease when I’m at work & it gets a little chilly. UPDATE 5/12/19 The house is warping!! The roof is bowing & so is the front panel next to the door. I don’t know what’s going on here! They did give me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Roam

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Item isn’t bad at all you just need to add support to the bottom. I have purchased 3 of these houses. One for myself, a friend and a brother. All 3 have the same issue with the bottom breaking in the center. Other than this I thinks it’s a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great doghouse for the money and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I put it together in about 35 minutes but I didn’t screw the roof on as I want to be able to lift it off for easy access for cleaning. I also stained it redwood to seal it for weatherproofing as I had read in other reviews that the wood was not water sealed and I want it to last. Very pleased. Only minor thing is that the black accent trim they painted was so lightly painted I think I will have to redo. They could do a better job on that. Overall pretty hard to beat for the money. I was impressed by the roofing materials. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: I like how it looks in my yard
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for two weeks now. It arrived a little beaten up - the box was opened on various sides and the wood had chipped and broken. Still, not enough to make a big difference. I like how it looks in my yard, and under the Floridian sun it keeps the temperature low enough. However, the wood itself is very thin and fragile (I can karate-chip it and break it without even knowing karate). So if you have a dog that destroys and chews everything on is way, this pet log might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Cordoves

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Built the large size doghouse in a very short time, added plastic barrier , followed by insulation on interior walls and bottom of floor. I Added carpet on walls ceiling and floor, added bed and pet heating pad, door. I think the wood may have trouble holding up to a wet climate. Our doghouse is kept under covered patio so in that case, out of severe weather I believe this will last a long time. Our dog house is for two 15-17 pound dogs and there is plenty of room. Im just eyeballing the weight on the pug she could be more by now its been a few days...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking hose but not really sturdy. When my husband has time he is going to reinforce the bottom. Let's really hot. My dog gets in and out but only when we are on the porch. Hope he will use it more in winter. He has chewed the frame, he still chews.everything.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to build and also the best thing about it was the instructions was also labeled on the back of the box so u didn’t need to stop and look at the paper instructions. One thing I didn’t like was the roof came in a little broken from two sides other than that pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Melting Jellybean

customer_reviews.title: Nice but good idea to buy the insulated liner with it
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in roughly 15 to 17 minutes and that includes the liner that we purchased with it. Easy instructions (: My feral cat's haven't been using them (we bought 2 of them) but we hope they'll figure it out soon. We put bed warmers in them with a soft cushion crate liner on top for cozy winter nights. @
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: construction could be better
customer_reviews.text: When we received it, there was a misalignment between one screw and its hole in the frame, so that the screw didn't hit the wood. After a summer of use, the roof is now separating from the frame in this area.
customer_reviews.author: myhale

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First rain of the season and my dog is soaked. The inside of the house is completely soaked. My poor dog. I do not recommend this dog house. The base board is very flimsy and broke. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela A. Tadeo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This is a good looking dog house and easy to assemble. Great size. It took me about 15 minutes to assemble it on my own. Cons: The wood arrived chipped and does not feel too sturdy. Only time will tell if it is weather resistant. Giving it 3 stars because it arrived chipped and it’s not as sturdy as I thought it would be. I think you can build one on your own that would be stronger for less amount of money but it would take a lot longer. Overall I’m satisfied with it for now and my dog has a place to sleep when it gets cold and rains.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: It's missing hardware and the entire floor.
customer_reviews.text: I am furious. This is just sloppy product supply. I'm missing very large, basic parts. Now it's up to me to see that this issue is fixed. What a time wasting endeavor. This should absolutely never have happened. I will never buy from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not weather proof
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is very pretty, however it needs to be under another shelter which kind of defeats the purpose. It fits our large shepherd well and is comfortable for your dog. Unfortunately, the floorboards fell out repeatedly and so we had to add bracing to reinforce the floor system. Pretty to look at but not sure I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: familyonthemoor

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: Would be a very nice dog house with better QC. This house comes partially assembled, and is easy to finish assembly. But I had 2 screws missing from the partially assembled part. I also had at least 3 broken pieces of wood. And one of the 4 plastic footings was chipped. Disappointed with the QC of this dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Solid house. My dogs like it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid doghouse. Wasn't too difficult to assemble. I like the way it looks. Be careful though. The shingling on the roof appears to often have gaps where it overlaps and meets the wooden frame of the roof piece. I purchased two of these dog houses and each roof piece has at least one of these spots. I filled the gaps with black caulk. If you do not, rain will get in and rot the underlying wood in no time. Overall pretty happy. Fill those gaps and this house should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: With the pad in the dog house the door will not open.  I have to remove it.
customer_reviews.text: I also purchased the door (plastic strips) but will have to remove them as it will not open and close with the pad that I purchased for the inside. I have a Mill dog that will not come into my house through the dog door if someone is in the kitchen, so I purchased the dog house to put on my deck so he would have a place to get into and out of inclement weather if he decided not to come into the kitchen. So far he has not been interested in using the dog house but I am hoping he will after I remove the plastic strips.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Pedrie

product_meta.title: Petmate Precision Extreme Outback Log Cabin.
product_meta.description: Size:MediumThe Petmate Extreme Log Cabin provides an outdoor shelter for pets year-round. Featuring a weather-resistant construction, the dog cabin's sealed protective coating, off-center entrance, raised floor and slanted asphalt roof keep pets comfortable and dry throughout the year. The solid wood and stainless-steel hardware provide long-lasting, durable protection for pets. The pet log cabin's adjustable feet balance easily on various types of surfaces for simple, worry-free placement. Made with a wood finish and black edges, the Extreme Log Cabin's traditional design provides a beautiful addition to any backyard. The cabin assembles easily in three quick steps. The Extreme Log Cabin is available in small, medium, large, and giant to accommodate all sizes of pets.
feature_bullets: MEDIUM DOG HOUSE: Cabin dog house's sealed protective coating, raised floor, & slanted asphalt roof provide protection from the elements & keep the cabin comfortable & dry. Assembles in 3 steps. Features an offset door so pets can get away from wind & rain.
Durable: With solid wood & stainless-steel hardware, the outdoor dog shelter is strong & sturdy for long-lasting protection. The outdoor dog house accommodates small to medium dog breeds.
KENNELS & HOUSES: Crate & kennel training is vital for dog safety & comfort. We provide traditional travel carriers, wire training & exercise kennels, play pens, barn-style dog houses & more.

PRECISION PET: Precision Pet offers a variety of heavy-duty products such as wire crates, chicken coops & rabbit hutches that provide pets with a cozy & safe place to rest, nest & feed. Also features litter box accessories & more.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
